value: The eastern provinces of Donetsk and Luhansk have seen violent clashes since the beginning of March. Governments of newly-formed Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics declared independence from Ukraine, and Ukrainian army fights them to restore integrity of Ukraine. The region remains extremely volatile and unsafe for travel. Possible dangers are: getting wounded or killed in the bombings, either misguided or directed at civilians, being kidnapped, robbed (including of the vehicle, you're using), being beaten or killed. Visiting these two provinces at this time is very unwise. However north of Lugansk region (to the north of all the major cities), which is held by Ukrainian army now, is somewhat more calm.

Therefore it has got an unusual appearance and acoustics. A constant temperature is about +14 °C. description= Zahavi Theatre, was erected in 1896 by Count Golenischev - Kutuzov, educator and poet. Reestablished in 1974, like amateur theater studio. And becoming a professional municipal theater title in 2002. The name of Theater came from Boris E. Zahavi, who on the stage "Grafskogo theater",  began his career as an artist.
